title: The Beat That My Heart Skipped/De battre mon coeur s'est arrÃƒÂª
description:
The Beat That My Heart Skipped - 2005

Rated: NR
Running Time: 1:47
Language: French (English Subtitles)

Tom (Romain Duris) seems destined to follow in his father&#039;s footsteps as a Parisian property shark until a chance encounter with his late mother&#039;s music agent leads him to believe he can become a concert pianist. With the help of a beautiful Chinese virtuoso, he starts preparing for a critical audition and making positive changes in his life. But secrets from this past threated to destroy his plans for the future.
